pain_points.description: Lack of onboarding for new users unfamiliar with the website.
supporting_quotes: it would be very useful if there was a way that we could walk new people through how to use the website.
the people that are sort of non-very computer literate would have a better experience up front.
pain_points.frequency_severity: High frequency; described with emotional intensity.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Relying on orientation sessions or personal walkthroughs from knowledgeable individuals.
pain_points.impact_on_user: New users struggle to navigate the site, leading to frustration and potential disengagement.

supporting_quotes: people have a hard time finding where they want to go.
I think that the navigation can be improved.
pain_points.frequency_severity: High frequency; mentioned as a significant issue.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users may try to guess or explore but often get lost.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Users waste time and become frustrated trying to locate events and information.

pain_points.description: Lack of clarity on event details such as day of the week and pricing.
supporting_quotes: it would be really important to include the day of the week of the events like Thursday or Friday.
it might be good to have that be also available in the summary.
pain_points.frequency_severity: Moderate frequency; described with moderate emotional intensity.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users might check multiple pages or contact support for details.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Users may overlook events due to missing information, affecting their participation.

pain_points.description: Unclear information on waiting lists for events.
supporting_quotes: if you sign up for the waiting list, it's not clear how many people are on the waiting list.
pain_points.frequency_severity: Moderate frequency; the issue is significant for users interested in events.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users may have to guess their chances or wait without knowing their status.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Users may miss out on events or feel uncertain about their participation.

prioritization.pain_point: Lack of onboarding for new users unfamiliar with the website.
Lack of clarity on event details such as day of the week and pricing.
Unclear information on waiting lists for events.
